abstract: A meat-lovers guide to eating less meat. Dax Shepard is listening. Remembering David Stern. Martin Scorsese is letting go. And more.
lead_paragraph: Welcome to the first weekend of 2020! Weâ€™ve started the year with an airstrike in Iraq that killed a top commander from Iran, raging wildfires in Australia and an attack of tumbleweeds in Washington State. These are some stories you may have missed in the whirlwind of news. So grab a big mug of tea and enjoy.
